lyrics:
"Im Offended" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Im Offended" (with Young Dolph) [Verse 1:] Husslers, ballers, gangsters, trap niggas This one before I spend my all for my sag niggas I can show you how to stall and get it back niggas You ain't no trap nigga then I don't wanna rap with None of the pills that I wanna lay in Light did a nigga take that, fake shots like I'm late splash Chicago our maid is, South Memphis where I got paid is Now done we burned allowed Me and Gucci back on the maybach Nah, I don't think I just stay fit Hundred million song way and my future I can taste that No hold up I erase that I need a whole billion don't give a fuck if we have to take that [Hook:] I ain't friendly I don't need you trappin friendly Don't ask me if I'm wrong be what you spendin If you see me then don't ask me if you feel me All this money nigga I don't need you in my business You just stepped on my gangsta toes and I'm a mad Now I'm a offended You just stepped on my gangsta toes and I'm a mad Now I'm a offended I thought you was a man that you defend yourself And you ain't half the man the man you tryin to pretend [Verse 2:] When I rap through my hood they think the marrow flew And if I stand on my money I'm just standing 92 And I've been hurting for so long I think my prayers came through Now when I rap through the hood it's in the tout or bentley coupe Louie shoes, Louie belt peb blow my way Quarter me in New Jersey, groupie bitch give me my space Don big as a soft ball, diamonds big as a golf ball With a sack a nigga might bird crap That bullet real like John walk I'm a true gangsta, third bread hussler Bustin in where I go, I rock 5 chains like a buster Watch what you say to me, we ain't family My goons are sprayed for me [Hook:] I ain't friendly I don't need you trappin friendly Don't ask me if I'm wrong be what you spendin If you see me then don't ask me if you feel me All this money nigga I don't need you in my business You just stepped on my gangsta toes and I'm a mad Now I'm a offended You just stepped on my gangsta toes and I'm a mad Now I'm a offended I thought you was a man that you defend yourself And you ain't half the man the man you tryin to pretend if
